meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who is very knowledgeable about or skillful in a particular area.

examples.sentence: She is an [expert] in marine biology.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是海洋生物學的專家。

examples.sentence: Consult an [expert] before making such a big decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在做如此重大決定之前，請諮詢專家。

examples.sentence: The [expert] provided valuable insights during the seminar.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 專家在研討會上提供了寶貴的見解。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A way in which things are organized or arranged.

examples.sentence: The [arrangement] of the furniture made the room feel bigger.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 家具的佈置使房間感覺更大。

examples.sentence: She has a beautiful floral [arrangement] on her table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的桌子上有一個漂亮的花藝佈置。

examples.sentence: The [arrangement] for tomorrow's event is nearly complete.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 明天活動的安排幾乎完成。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A member of the species Homo sapiens, distinguished from other animals.

examples.sentence: Every [human] has the right to live freely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個人類都有權自由生活。

examples.sentence: Humans are known for their ability to create.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 人類因其創造能力而聞名。

examples.sentence: The study focused on [human] behavior.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這項研究集中於人類行為。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The expression of thoughts and feelings by articulate sounds.

examples.sentence: Her [speech] impressed everyone at the event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的演講讓在場的每個人都印象深刻

examples.sentence: He gave a [speech] on the importance of education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他發表了一篇關於教育重要性的演講

examples.sentence: Practice your [speech] before delivering it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在演講前練習您的演說

meanings.meaning_en_US: A particular procedure by which something is done; a manner or way.

examples.sentence: Her fashion [style] is very unique.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的服裝風格非常獨特。

examples.sentence: The artist is known for his innovative [style].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位藝術家因其創新的風格而聞名。

examples.sentence: Everyone has their own [style] of writing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個人都有自己的寫作風格。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make something in a particular way.

examples.sentence: She decided to [style] her hair differently for the event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定為這次活動給自己的頭髮設計不同的造型。

examples.sentence: He [styled] the presentation to keep it engaging.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他設計了這次演講，以保持其吸引力。

examples.sentence: The decorator [styled] the room with a modern touch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 裝飾者為房間設計了現代感。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ability to make considered decisions or come to sensible conclusions.

examples.sentence: Her [judgment] in choosing friends is questionable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在選擇朋友上的判斷力值得懷疑。

examples.sentence: The [judgment] of the court was fair and just.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 法庭的判決是公平公正的。

examples.sentence: Don't let emotions cloud your [judgment].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要讓情感影響你的判斷。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A distinct section of a book or text.

examples.sentence: She finished reading the first [chapter] last night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她昨晚讀完了第一章。

examples.sentence: Each [chapter] explores a different theme.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個章節探討不同的主題。

examples.sentence: The book has ten [chapters] in total.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書總共有十個章節。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A division in a society or organization.

examples.sentence: The local [chapter] of the organization meets monthly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該組織的地方分部每月開會。

examples.sentence: Each [chapter] has its own leadership.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個分部都有自己的領導班子。

examples.sentence: The club will establish a new [chapter] next year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該俱樂部明年將成立一個新的分部。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A slender, sharp implement used for sewing or injecting.

examples.sentence: She threaded the [needle] before starting to sew.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在開始縫紉之前穿了針.

examples.sentence: A [needle] can be used to inject medicine.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 針可以用來注射藥物.

examples.sentence: He lost his sewing [needle] on the floor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在地板上丟失了他的縫紉針.

meanings.meaning_en_US: With no special or distinctive features; normal.

examples.sentence: He led an [ordinary] life without any fame.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他過著普通的生活，沒有任何名望。

examples.sentence: There's nothing [ordinary] about her talent.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的才華並不普通。

examples.sentence: She prefers [ordinary] meals over gourmet food.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡普通的餐點而不是美食。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cause to move or be apart.

examples.sentence: He tried to [separate] the two fighting dogs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試圖把兩隻打架的狗分開。

examples.sentence: Please [separate] the trash by type.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請按類別將垃圾分開。

examples.sentence: They decided to [separate] for a while.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定暫時分開。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The course or path on which something moves or points.

examples.sentence: Please follow the [direction] on the sign.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請按照告示牌上的指示行進

examples.sentence: The wind is blowing in the opposite [direction].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風正朝著相反的方向吹

examples.sentence: He needs to get clear [direction] on his project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要對他的項目有清楚的指導

meanings.meaning_en_US: The non-physical part of a person, often regarded as the true self.

examples.sentence: He has a strong [spirit] that inspires those around him.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有一種強烈的精神，激勵著身邊的人。

examples.sentence: The old myths say that the [spirit] of the forest protects the trees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 古老的神話說，森林的靈魂保護著樹木。

examples.sentence: It is important to keep your [spirit] high during challenging times.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在艱難時期保持高昂的精神是很重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The rate at which someone or something moves or operates.

examples.sentence: The car was traveling at a high [speed].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那輛車以高速行駛

examples.sentence: He was amazed by the [speed] of the internet connection.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對網絡連接的速度感到驚訝

examples.sentence: She increased her running [speed] over time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 隨著時間的推移，她提高了跑步的速度

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of a color intermediate between red and blue.

examples.sentence: She wore a beautiful [purple] gown to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿了一件美麗的紫色長裙出席派對

examples.sentence: The flowers bloomed in shades of [purple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些花以紫色的色調綻放

examples.sentence: His favorite crayon is [purple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他最喜歡的蠟筆是紫色的

meanings.meaning_en_US: A shallow, open container used for cooking or holding food.

examples.sentence: She sautéed the vegetables in the [pan].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在平底鍋裡炒了蔬菜。

examples.sentence: Please put the [pan] on the stove.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把平底鍋放在爐子上。

examples.sentence: He cleaned the [pan] after cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他煮完後清理了平底鍋。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A consequence or outcome of something.

examples.sentence: The [result] of the experiment was surprising.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 實驗的結果令人驚訝。

examples.sentence: We expect a positive [result] from the new strategy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們期待新策略帶來積極的結果。

examples.sentence: She was pleased with the [results] of her hard work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對自己的努力結果感到滿意。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a straightforward or plain manner; just.

examples.sentence: You can [simply] press the button to start.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以簡單地按下按鈕開始。

examples.sentence: This task can be solved [simply].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個任務可以簡單地解決。

examples.sentence: He explained the concept [simply].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他簡單地解釋了這個概念。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to emphasize a statement or response.

examples.sentence: He is, [indeed], a talented musician.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他確實是一位才華橫溢的音樂家。

examples.sentence: The task was challenging, [indeed].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這項任務確實很具挑戰性。

examples.sentence: [Indeed], we must address this issue immediately.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確實，我們必須立即解決這個問題。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Two individuals of the same sort considered together.

examples.sentence: They are a lovely [couple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們是一對可愛的情侶。

examples.sentence: A [couple] of friends joined us for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 幾個朋友加入我們的晚餐。

examples.sentence: She gave a [couple] of reasons for her decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為自己的決定給出了幾個理由。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A visual representation of data.

examples.sentence: He created a [chart] to visualize the sales data.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他創建了一個圖表來視覺化銷售數據。

examples.sentence: The [chart] shows trends over the last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這張圖表顯示了過去一年的趨勢。

examples.sentence: Students must learn to read a [chart] in math class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學生必須學會在數學課上閱讀圖表。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To organize information visually.

examples.sentence: We will [chart] the progress of the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們將繪製項目的進展。

examples.sentence: She decided to [chart] her financial goals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定繪製她的財務目標。

examples.sentence: The team will [chart] the timeline for the launch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊將繪製發佈的時間表。
